verses.verse: Thus the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> were <S%H3615>finished<s%>, and all the host of <S%H6635>them<s%>.

And on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3615>ended<s%> his <S%H4399>work<s%> which he had <S%H6213>made<s%>; and he <S%H7673>rested<s%> on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> from all his <S%H4399>work<s%> which he had <S%H6213>made<s%>.

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, and <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> it: <S%H3588>because<s%> that in it he had <S%H7673>rested<s%> from all his <S%H4399>work<s%> which <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1254>created<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%>. created: Heb. created to make

<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> and of the <S%H776>earth<s%> when they were <S%H1254>created<s%>, in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> and the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>,

And every <S%H7880>plant<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H2962>before<s%> it was in the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and every <S%H6212>herb<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H2962>before<s%> it <S%H6779>grew<s%>: <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H3808>not<s%> caused it to <S%H4305>rain<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and there was <S%H369>not<s%> a <S%H120>man<s%> to <S%H5647>till<s%> the <S%H127>ground<s%>.

But there went <S%H5927>up<s%> a <S%H108>mist<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and <S%H8248>watered<s%> the whole <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>ground<s%>. there: or, a mist which went up from, etc.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3335>formed<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> of the <S%H6083>dust<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H127>ground<s%>, and <S%H5301>breathed<s%> into his <S%H639>nostrils<s%> the <S%H5397>breath<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%>; and <S%H120>man<s%> became a <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%>. of the dust: Heb. dust of the ground

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5193>planted<s%> a <S%H1588>garden<s%> <S%H6924>eastward<s%> in <S%H5731>Eden<s%>; and <S%H8033>there<s%> he <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> he had <S%H3335>formed<s%>.

And <S%H4480>out<s%> of the <S%H127>ground<s%> <S%H6779>made<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> to <S%H6779>grow<s%> every <S%H6086>tree<s%> that is <S%H2530>pleasant<s%> to the <S%H4758>sight<s%>, and <S%H2896>good<s%> for <S%H3978>food<s%>; the <S%H6086>tree<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%> also in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H1588>garden<s%>, and the <S%H6086>tree<s%> of <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H7451>evil<s%>.

And a <S%H5104>river<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden<s%> to <S%H8248>water<s%> the <S%H1588>garden<s%>; and from thence it was <S%H6504>parted<s%>, and became into <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7218>heads<s%>.

The <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H259>first<s%> is <S%H6376>Pison<s%>: <S%H1931>that<s%> is it which <S%H5437>compasseth<s%> the whole <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2341>Havilah<s%>, <S%H834>where<s%> there is <S%H2091>gold<s%>;
And the <S%H2091>gold<s%> of <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%>: there is <S%H916>bdellium<s%> and the <S%H7718>onyx<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%>.

And the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H5104>river<s%> is <S%H1521>Gihon<s%>: the same is it that <S%H5437>compasseth<s%> the whole <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3568>Ethiopia<s%>. Ethiopia: Heb. Cush

And the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H5104>river<s%> is <S%H2313>Hiddekel<s%>: that is it which goeth <S%H1980>toward<s%> the <S%H6926>east<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%>. And the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H5104>river<s%> is <S%H6578>Euphrates<s%>. toward: or, eastward to Assyria

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H120>man<s%>, and put <S%H3240>him<s%> into the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden<s%> to <S%H5647>dress<s%> it and to <S%H8104>keep<s%> it. the man: or, Adam

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Of every <S%H6086>tree<s%> of the <S%H1588>garden<s%> thou mayest <S%H398>freely<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%>: thou: Heb. eating thou shalt eat

But of the <S%H6086>tree<s%> of the <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H7451>evil<s%>, thou shalt not <S%H398>eat<s%> of it: for in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that thou <S%H398>eatest<s%> thereof thou shalt <S%H4191>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die<s%>. thou shalt surely: Heb. dying thou shalt die

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, It is not <S%H2896>good<s%> that the <S%H120>man<s%> should <S%H1961>be<s%> alone; I will <S%H6213>make<s%> him an help <S%H5828>meet<s%> for him. meet: Heb. as before him

And out of the <S%H127>ground<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3335>formed<s%> every <S%H2416>beast<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>, and every <S%H5775>fowl<s%> of the <S%H8064>air<s%>; and <S%H935>brought<s%> them unto <S%H120>Adam<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> what he would <S%H7121>call<s%> them: and whatsoever <S%H120>Adam<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> every <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>creature<s%>, <S%H1931>that<s%> was the name <S%H8034>thereof<s%>. Adam: or, the man

And <S%H120>Adam<s%> <S%H7121>gave<s%> <S%H8034>names<s%> to all <S%H929>cattle<s%>, and to the <S%H5775>fowl<s%> of the <S%H8064>air<s%>, and to every <S%H2416>beast<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>; but for <S%H120>Adam<s%> there was not <S%H4672>found<s%> an help <S%H5828>meet<s%> for him. gave: Heb. called

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5307>caused<s%> a deep <S%H8639>sleep<s%> to <S%H5307>fall<s%> upon <S%H121>Adam<s%>, and he <S%H3462>slept<s%>: and he <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of his <S%H6763>ribs<s%>, and closed <S%H5462>up<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> instead thereof;

And the <S%H6763>rib<s%>, which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H3947>taken<s%> from <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H1129>made<s%> he a <S%H802>woman<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> her unto the <S%H120>man<s%>. made: Heb. builded

And <S%H120>Adam<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H2063>This<s%> is <S%H6471>now<s%> <S%H6106>bone<s%> of my <S%H6106>bones<s%>, and <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of my <S%H1320>flesh<s%>: <S%H2063>she<s%> shall be <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H802>Woman<s%>, because <S%H2063>she<s%> was <S%H3947>taken<s%> out of <S%H376>Man<s%>. Woman: Heb. Isha Man: Heb. Ish

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> shall a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5800>leave<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> and his <S%H517>mother<s%>, and shall <S%H1692>cleave<s%> unto his <S%H802>wife<s%>: and they shall be <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%>.
And they were <S%H8147>both<s%> <S%H6174>naked<s%>, the <S%H120>man<s%> and his <S%H802>wife<s%>, and were not <S%H954>ashamed<s%>.
